record.dc:title: CP5(GG) Irwin Village Site 12CP5, Campbell County, Tennessee. Longitudinal section of mold around Northeast corner of primary floor of Structure 2.
record.wpa:narrative: This structure shows no horizontal molds. The molds on the sides average 5-1/2 inches in diameter and penetrate the hardpan for a distance of 24". A doorway is apparent at the SE corner, no altar found.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph. Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs CP5(AA) [fhm00501], CP5(BB) [fhm00502], CP5(CC) [fhm00503], CP5(I I) [fhm00509], 822CP5(J) [fhm00608], 830CP5(M) [fhm00611], 831CP5(N) [fhm00612], and 893CP5(S) [fhm00617], 948CP5(W) [fhm00621]
